api_list.api_description: Get the 10000 latest measurements for a sensor.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

required_parameters.name: sensor_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the sensor you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format the sensor data is returned in.

query: Can you provide the weather forecast for Berlin, Germany with latitude=52.5200, longitude=13.4050 and also give me the latest 10000 measurements from a temperature sensor in a local senseBox with senseBox ID 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c and sensor ID 57000b8745fd40c8196ad050?
